casebody.data:
99-0527 (La. 4/23/99)

Nicholas H. LOCICERO v. JEFFERSON PARISH DEPT. OF FLEET MANAGEMENT & HUMAN RESOURCE MANAGEMENT. Nicholas H. Locicero v. John C. Combe, Jr., Peter J. Russo, Jr. and Elizabeth P. Blitch, not Individually but in their Capacity as Members of, and Constituting, The Jeff. Parish Personnel Board. No. 99-C-0527. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Locicero, Nicholas H.; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Jefferson 24th Judicial District Court Div. “M” Number 513-198; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Number 98-CA-0521, 98-CA-0571

Denied.

MARCUS, J. not on panel.
